profile_positions.title: Maatschappelijk begeleider

profile_positions.location: Dubai Media City, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for monitoring attendance in line with daily rotas.
•	Assess and manage team objectives on call statistics.
•	Responsible for ensuring all tasks are completed in a timely manner and in accordance with standard quality procedures.
•	Ensure all emails correspondence to customers / other departments is acted on effectively and promptly.
•	Ensure good relations established and maintained with key interfacing areas, managing customer affecting issues to resolution where appropriate.
•	Develop best working practices and develop knowledge within the team.
•	Adhere to all relevant company policies.
•	Represent the department as required.
•	Provide support to the scheduling and control function.
•	Make sure every agent fully understands and keep up to date with the range of products, services business updates and changes.
•	Manage the team to consistently deliver exceptional customer service in a demanding and changing environment.
•	assist agents to resolve customer inquiries and concerns and to escalate them whenever applicable based on our escalation guidelines and procedures and to take escalation calls whenever required.
•	Maintains appearance and adopts a professional approach at all times.
•	Assist with speedy resolution of customer disputes relating to technical issues.
•	Liaise with technicians and Technical Team to resolve related faults.
•	Responsible for the rectification of escalated Technical faults.
•	Ensure all Customer records are accurately maintained.
•	Promptly execute allocated work as directed by line manager.
•	Keep up to date on all new products and technical developments.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Team Manager

profile_positions.location: Dubai Media City, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
profile_positions.description:
Duties & Responsibilities•	                                                        
To answer all 2nd level Tech calls while adhering to Technical Call diagnostic.
•	To handle outbound calls from immerging dealers and markets. 
•	To handle customer inquiries, complaints, payments’ extension and service requests.
•	To constantly be fully aware of OSN’s product knowledge, business rules, campaign activity and process. 
•	To consistently update and maintain an awareness of competitor activity. 
•	To complete all paper and system based records.
•	Meet weekly and monthly performance benchmarks in speed, accuracy and volume. 
•	To actively contribute, participate and work effectively towards attaining the team’s business goals.
•	To assist on day to day tasks provided by the team manager.
•	Quickly analyzing and interpreting customer inquiries to identify customer needs
•	Listen to customers, ask questions as appropriate to discover needs while simultaneously using a keyboard to capture information
•	Fulfill customer expectations in a way that also complies with policies, practices and procedures
•	Identify and resolve complaints, influence to achieve a solution which is mutually satisfactory to the customer
•	Handle business correspondence and TSC mailbox by replying promptly to all dealers emails, coordinating urgent technical visits with controllers and operations and assisting our Dealers in activations request swap upgrade scheduling the appointment maintenance across the middle east and north Africa 
Awards with OSN 

     Winner of Regional Perfect Call 5 Times 
     Winner of Regional UAE Top Achiever FCR 5Times 
     Winner of Regional Top Achiever 2 Times 
     My e-KTS ( yearly performance ) for 2010 & 2012 & 2014 very good 
     My e-KTS in 2011 & 2013 is (outstanding) yearly achievement 
   My  e- KTS in 2015 is very good
profile_positions.title: Senior Customer Service Executive

profile_positions.location: Dubai Media City, Dubai, United Arab Emirates
profile_positions.description:
To provide a full customer service function externally and internally to whom products, services, programs and information must be provided to i.e. Subscribers, Call Centre Manager, Supervisors and affiliated departments. 
•	On completion of probation period, additional responsibility – first time resolution of all customer reported faults using technical diagnostics and IBS thus ensuring customer satisfaction is maximized.
•	To provide excellent after sales support – maintain and retain customers
•	Answer general inquiries – e.g. programming, billing, TV guides request
•	Technical support
•	Information and data collection 
•	Maintain and update customer information
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Executive

company.name: Antonio Trading for leather materials , Part of SS lootah Group

profile_positions.company: Antonio Trading for leather materials , Part of SS lootah Group
profile_positions.description:
•	Coordinates the activities of subordinates
•	Schedules students or temporary workers for rush periods
•	Trains and coordinates the new employees in sales, store control and store ordering.
•	Informs customers regarding technical or specialized merchandise
•	Decision maker, direct input to management on merchandise techniques, new products, competitive pricing or promotional ideas.
•	Assists in planning and coordinating special promotions by ordering supplies and merchandise, scheduling needed staff and preparing signs
•	Compiles data for reports such as promotional event success evaluation or special inventory counts.
•	Manage the POS system, including amendments, trouble shooting and error logging 
•	Maintain optimum stock levels in store through monitoring stock and placing orders      with the Purchase department. 
•	Manage stock takes in store in liaison with the area manager 
•	Ensure all brand and the company policies and procedures are implemented and                 monitor  in Store
•	Analyze available data, prepare and submit reports to the Area Manager, relating to sales 
•	Figures, promotional activities and customer feedback
profile_positions.title: Showroom Team leader

profile_positions.description:
Plan and coordinate the provision of friendly, efficient services to guests

*  Schedule activities for guests

*  Plan and coordinate all promotional activities targeting clients

*  Trace relevant statistics about clientele

*  Coordinate and supervise all activities for guests

*  Assist with check-ins / check-outs of clients

*  Greet Guests upon arrival

*  Assist guests with airline bookings and reconfirmation’s

*  Assist all departments in being receptive to the needs of guests

*  Assist staff with language and culture

*  Attend recreation activities when necessary

*  Plan and conduct group and function rundown meetings

*  Assist in any other duties when required by the Front Office Manager

*  Assist with translations (information: guest directory; menus etc.) as required

*  Provide feedback from Guests to Front Office Manager for action
